data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of María Trinidad Sánchez unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 14,709 believers in María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 135,700 citizens of María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of María Trinidad Sánchez, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: María Trinidad Sánchez
location.cities_list: Nagua, Río San Juan, El Factor, Cabrera, Arroyo Salado
location.cities_list_w_pop: Nagua (33,862), Río San Juan (8,983), El Factor (7,014), Cabrera (4,947), Arroyo Salado (1,990)
